content: The Celestial Registry Tablet is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Registry_Tablet.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Registry Tablet'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Registry Tablet is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
